alert.note: Alert for Palo Duro Canyon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 09 at 10:45PM CDT until July 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For Sunday, hot conditions with high temperatures of 105 degrees expected. For Monday, dangerously hot conditions with high temperatures up to 110 degrees possible. * WHERE...Palo Duro Canyon State Park. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Sunday. For the Excessive Heat Watch, from Noon Monday through 8 PM Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
